page.title: 18WHAT IT COSTS TO PLAY GOLF
page.content:
GREEN FEES :1985.
CHARGE FOR A SINGLE ROUND. OLD COURSE Â£15 (Nov _ March Â£9) NEW COURSE Â£7 JUBILEE COURSE Â£4 EDEN COURSE Â£5.50 BALGOVE COURSE Â£1.50
WEEKLY TICKET. (excl.Old Course) Â£24
ANNUAL TICKET. (excl. Old Course from 1st July to 30th September.) Ordinary rate. Â£120 Member of a St.Andrews' Golf Club. Â£70 Resident of St.Andrews. Â£40 Resident Senior citizen. Â£20 Student at St.Andrews University. Â£16 Child at school in St.Andrews. Â£16 Resident's child aged 16_18 yrs. Â£16 Resident's child under 16yrs. FREE
THE OLD COURSE IS CLOSED ON SUNDAYS.
